thread.section_title: toolani Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von toolani | toolani.com
thread.title: mohinder

author: mohinder
title: mohinder
text:
I had problems when I first joined as connection kept on dropping or it would connect without any dial tone. The times it did connect the other party could not hear me although I could.
I contacted David at customer services and I cannot praise him enough with the service I received. He refunded failed calls and also asked the technical dept to route the call internally via a different number. This did not affect the number I would dial. I must say this has worked and the last two calls made were very satisfactory, but voice quality still a little poor. That is why I have given 4 stars.
